title: language_test_3_8
feedback: The correct answer is “age groups; however," and the sentence should read: “ASD occurs in all ethnic, socioeconomic, and age groups; however, males are four times more likely to have ASD than females.” This question asks you to choose the best transition word to show the connection between ideas. The first part of the sentence describes the wide range of groups that are equally affected by ASD. The second part mentions that ASD is unevenly distributed by gender; men are more likely to have ASD than women. These two ideas contrast each other. The words “accordingly,” “otherwise,” and “subsequently” don’t connect the ideas clearly. The word “however” shows contrast and is the correct choice.
